sentences.sContent: European farmers are planning a massive demonstration against farm subsidy cuts.
sentences.sCn: 欧洲的农场主们正在策划一场反对削减农场补贴的大游行。

synos.tran: [财政]补贴；[劳经]津贴；[会计][经]补助金

remMethod.val: sub(下面)+sid(坐)+y → 坐下来领补助金 → 补助金

words.tran: 资助或补助（subsidize的过去时和过去分词）
资助；给与奖助金；向…行贿

trans.tranOther: money that is paid by a government or organization to make prices lower, reduce the cost of producing goods etc
